main event: Mr. and Mrs. Willoughby of Ohio experienced a UFO sighting involving a large circular object with a red light observed hovering near their home in late July or early August 1955.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on a dark and cloudy night while the witness was closing his television shop., The object was described as large, like a transport plane but with no visible motors., Witnesses reported a peculiar movement of the object, which seemed to dip and flash in various directions., The object emitted intense lights and hovered at about 50-100 feet above ground., Multiple witnesses in the area confirmed seeing strange UFOs around the same time.
sighted object: large circular UFO with red and blue-gray lights
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Willoughby, residents with technical experience in television.
